data.name: XXMLDocumentWrapper
desc: When converting SAX events into a DOM tree, this interface is used to manipulate the DOM data in UNO perspective.
Every language has its own methods to manipulate its native DOM data structure, this interface provides a common method set which each language have to implement.
In another word, this interface wraps language dependent methods, then other component can manipulate DOM data through UNO methods.

methods.name: clearUselessData
desc: Clears all useless element in a branch of the DOM tree along the tree order.

methods.name: collapse
desc: Each element in the ancestor path of the node will be checked, if this element is empty, then deletes it.

methods.name: generateSAXEvents
desc: Converts a part of the DOM tree into SAX events.

methods.name: getNodeName
desc: Gets the name of the element.

methods.name: getTree
desc: Converts the whole DOM tree into a SAX event stream.

methods.name: isCurrent
desc: Checks whether an element is the current element.

methods.name: isCurrentElementEmpty
desc: Checks whether the current element is empty.

methods.name: rebuildIDLink
desc: Rebuild the ID attribute in the branch starting from the particular element.

methods.name: removeCurrentElement
desc: When the current element is removed, then its parent element becomes the new current element.

methods.name: setCurrentElement
desc: When the current element is replaced outside of this interface, then uses this method can update the current element pointer.
